snippet: The Knicks, eliminated from the N.B.A. playoffs Wednesday night by Miami, are looking ahead to an off-season that will be dominated by important personnel decisions.
abstract: New York Knicks, eliminated from the NBA playoffs by Miami Heat, clean out their lockers and look ahead to an off-season that will be dominated by important personnel decisions.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, eliminated from the N.B.A. playoffs Wednesday night by Miami, are looking ahead to an off-season that will be dominated by important personnel decisions.

headline.seo: As the Knicks Say Goodbye, a Busy and Challenging Off-Season Awaits
headline.main: Knicks Players Promise to ‘Figure It Out’
